title: Self-Contained Stay on the Coral Coast
description: Explore Australiaâ€™s stunning coral coast and striking beaches from the comfort of Dongara Tourist Park in Port Denison, the perfect base for your next family adventure. A bottle of wine on arrival accompanied by an early check-in will ensure maximum relaxation time with the magnificent Indian Ocean backdropping your getaway. One bedroom studios and two-bedroom cabins are available with continental breakfast supplies to get you started for a day of exploration or relaxation. Undercover BBQs with a jumping pillow will ensure the whole family is entertained.
